name: qtkiller comp. with cutkiller for W32
short_description: This software is a file-cutter, compatible with cutkiller 1.41 for Windows. It\'s a softare made with QT and C++ inder visual C++ 6.0, it supports all system on which QT has been ported but we have only compiled it on windows with MSVC60
